member.name: F:Sceelix.Designer.Unity3D.Settings.UnityConnectionSettings.Address
member.summary: Address to which the the Unity Plugin should connect. This value should match the configuration in the Unity Plugin.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Designer.Unity3D.Settings.UnityConnectionSettings.Port
member.summary: Port through which the Unity Plugin should connect. This value should match the configuration in the Unity Plugin.
